categories: PhD Run Ultra Light Pattern Crew Socks
description: Put a colourful twist in your running wardrobe. These run-specific socks are made with Indestructawool and Shred Shield technology to go kilometre after kilometre. Ultra light cushion puts barely anything between you and your shoe for better ground feel.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.
name: Smartwool PhD Run Ultra Light Pattern Crew Socks - Unisex
